title: Quantum Mechanics on a Noncommutative Brane in M(atrix) Theory
abstract: We consider the quantum mechanics of a particle on a noncommutative two-sphere with the coordinates obeying an SU(2)-algebra. The momentum operator can be constructed in terms of an $SU(2)\times SU(2)$-extension and the Heisenberg algebra recovered in the smooth manifold limit. Similar considerations apply to the more general SU(n) case.
